jobs.title: Elementary Teacher K-5 Openings for the 25-26 school year (Full and Part Time)
jobs.status: Full Time and Part Time (please indicate on application if you are ONLY interested in Part Time positions)The salary for this position is assigned to the TT Salary Schedule.To view the salary schedule, please select the following linkTT Salary Schedule.WCSD will recognize no more than thirteen full time, complete years of previous teaching experience when placing on the TT Salary Schedule. jobs.title: HVAC Mechanic or Mechanic Apprentice
jobs.status: Full Time, 40 hours per week (year round, 239 day calendar)Minimum Requirements forHVAC Mechanic:High school diploma or general education degree (GED) and completion of a certified HVAC/R training program at an accredited technical college (or equivalent); or equivalent combination of education and directly related experience is required.  5 years commercial HVAC experience preferred.Must have experience working on electric motors and starters of various sizes and voltages is required; knowledge of VFD's and ability to work with these systems is beneficial.  Must have and maintain a valid Utah Driver’s License.The salary for this position is assigned to Level 8 of the MN Salary Schedule.To view the salary schedule, please select the following linkMN Salary Schedule.Minimum Requirements forHVAC Mechanic Apprentice:High school diploma or general education degree (GED) and completion of a certified HVAC/R training program at an accredited technical college (or equivalent); or equivalent combination of education and directly related experience is required.   A training schedule is available on the HVAC Mechanice Apprentice job description.  Must have and maintain a valid Utah Driver’s License.The salary for this position may begin on lane 4 (or higher) of the MN Salary Schedule, dependent on the training schedule placement.To view the salary schedule, please select the following linkMN Salary Schedule.Attachment(s):HVAC Mechanic Apprentice ADDENDUM.pdfHVAC Mechanic.pdfEmail To A FriendPrint Version

jobs.title: Nutrition Program Coordinator
jobs.status: Full Time, 40 hours per week (239 day calendar)Minimum Requirements:A minimum of a Bachelor’s Degreewithone of the following:an academic major in specific areas of concentration such as food and nutrition, food service management, dietetics, family and consumer sciences, nutrition education, culinary arts, business, or a related field;ORa state recognized certificate for school nutrition directors;ORa minimum of five years’ experience in management of school nutrition programs.A minimum of eight hours of food safety training is required to be completed within 30 days of start date and no more than five years old if completed prior to start date.CERTIFICATES, LICENSES, REGISTRATIONSMust have and maintain an active Utah Driver’s License.The salary for this position is assigned to lane 2 of the AA Salary Schedule.To view the salary schedule, please select the following linkAA Salary Schedule.Attachment(s):Nutrition Program Coordinator.pdfEmail To A FriendPrint Version

jobs.title: Learning Coach
jobs.status: Full Time, 1 FTEMinimum Requirements:An Active Professional level Utah Teaching License.  ESL endorsement would be beneficial.Must have successfully completed a minimum of 3 years general classroom teaching experience.  Candidates with WCSD teaching experience are preferred.As per the Utah State Board of Education, completion of LETRS training is required for all elementary learning coaches.  Starting in the 2023-24 school year, completion of the USBE Instructional Coaching Endorsement and WCSD Teacher Leader Endorsement are recommended within the first 3 years of service in this role.The salary for this position is assigned to the TT Salary Schedule.To view the salary schedule, please select the following linkTT Salary Schedule.Attachment(s):TSA Learning Coach.pdfEmail To A FriendPrint Version

jobs.title: Head Drill Coach (no teaching assignment)
jobs.description: This Head Drill coaching assignment is for the 2025-2026 school year with no expectation of a teaching assignment.WCSD coaches are required to meet all UHSAA certification requirementspriorto starting assignment and are required to maintain certifications during duration of employment.If any additional questions, applicants can contact the Athletic Director, Paula Haws,  at paula.haws@washk12.org.A stipend will be provided for this assignment.

jobs.title: Head Drill Coach (no teaching assignment)
jobs.description: This Head Drill coaching assignment is for the 2025-2026 school year with no expectation of a teaching assignment.WCSD coaches are required to meet all UHSAA certification requirementspriorto starting assignment and are required to maintain certifications during duration of employment.If any additional questions, applicants can contact the Athletic Director, Nate Bowler at nathan.bowler@washk12.org.A stipend will be provided for this assignment.

jobs.title: Head Girls Basketball Coach (no teaching assignment)
jobs.description: This Head Girls Basketball Coaching assignment is for the 2025-2026 school year with no expectation of a teaching assignment.WCSD coaches are required to meet all UHSAA certification requirementspriorto starting assignment and are required to maintain certifications during duration of employment.If any additional questions, applicants can contact the Athletic Director, Dustin Drake, at Dustin.drake@washk12.org.A stipend will be provided for this assignment.

jobs.title: Sub Bus Attendant
jobs.status: On-Call/As Needed BasisMinimum Requirements:High school diploma or general education degree (GED); or six months to one year related experience and/or training; or equivalent combination of education and experience.Ability to work effectively with individuals with disabilities.  Ability to learn tasks quickly and work with minimum supervision.  Ability to learn and implement emergency procedures associated with bus.  Previous experience working with individuals with disabilities preferred.The salary for this position is assigned to Level 2 of the SC Salary Schedule.To view the salary schedule, please select the following linkSC Salary Schedule.Attachment(s):Bus Attendant.pdfEmail To A FriendPrint Version
